title: Mia Bend-a-roo Headband-A Fashionable Headwrap OR Scarf With A Hidden Wire That Bends Into Many Shapes And Styles-Wire Is Covered With Grey Leopard Printed Beautiful Silk Material(1 piece per package)
features: Mia Bend-A-Roo is headband (or scarf) with a hidden wire that can be bent into any shape or style.
The hidden wire is covered by pretty fashionable silk material.
Wear as a headband, ponytail wrap, bun decoration, braid decoration, belt, scarf and more!
One size fits all. Worls on all hair types. Great for women and girls of all ages.
